revised_title: A Study of Phymosoma Varians: Anatomy, Physiology, and Nervous System
tldr: The author examines the anatomy, physiology, and nervous system of Phymosoma varians, a Gephyrean species found in coral reefs. They describe its unique skeletal tissue, vascular system, reproductive organs, and nervous system, including sensory pits in the brain and ectodermal sense organs in the introvert. This research contributes to the understanding of this fascinating marine organism.
